attributes.action: instruct the security services to stop committing serious abuses of human rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at the moment they commit serious abuses of articles 3, 8, and 10 of the ECHR with impunity.   They are  effectively above the law because no solicitor will take up the case.  This means that the human rights act is a dead letter because it cannot be enforced.
